column5: The career of an engineering project manager is an exciting and challenging one - overseeing complex projects, taking charge of teams and delivering on time and on budget. Yet there's a worldwide shortage of graduates who have the elusive combination of technical knowledge and the management capability that such a demanding role needs. This Masters degree was created to meet that demand.Why study MSc Engineering Management at Middlesex University?This in-depth, technical and practical course is designed specifically for those students who have studied engineering at university level and are looking to develop an advanced mastery of the subject.
column7: UK students Full-time students: £10,500 Part-time students: £70 per credit Part-time students: £35 per dissertation credit  EU/International Full-time students: £15,700 Part-time students: £101 per credit Part-time students: £50 per dissertation credit
